entry.name: getVersionString
entry.short: Returns the berkelium host version e.g. “22.0.1229.94”

entry.name: getMinor
entry.short: Returns the Minor Version, always zero?

entry.name: isMinVersion
entry.short: Returns true if the given Version is less or equal to the version of the executable represented by this BerkeliumExecutable object.

group.name: HostExecutable
group.short: Represents a reference to the executable file of the berkelium host process.

entry.name: forExecutable
entry.short: Creates an BerkeliumHostExecutable Object representing the given executable.

entry.name: forSystemInstalled
entry.short: Creates an BerkeliumHostExecutable, the exectuable is searched through system path or system configuration (e.g. registry on windows)
entry.todo: Maybe a version number should be given here

entry.name: getVersion
entry.short: Returns the version of this berkelium host executable.

entry.name: forProfile
entry.short: Returns the default profile for the given application name. A profile can only be held open by one instance at the same time . An exception is thrown of the profile is already be used.

entry.name: forProfile
entry.short: As above, but instead the given profile is used.

entry.name: createTemporaryProfile
entry.short: Creates a temporary profile that gets automatically removed after use.
